column4: in xchat, when i right click a link, the options include "Mozilla Firefox" and "Mozilla." Which is it if I want to open a link from Xchat to the currently running firefox?
i recall there being a 'open in new browser, open in new tab' and some other options in my xchat menus
Regarding: rm -rf / is what BigJG and Choubaka said true. That not just a root user, but also a non-root user would have deleted his home directory?
yes, but in my case, those options are sub-nested under "mozilla" and "mozilla firefox".
